overview: A girl who finds her parents not paying her any attention, when she comes to see her newborn sister in hospital, wants to test their love for her. She runs away, only to get lost in her own insecurities. The doll that she was supposed to give to her little sister plays an important role in bringing her back to reality. Even now, however, a strand of jealousy persists.
title: Pavakutti (My Little Doll)
